example.parse: (IP (CP-CND (ADVP (CS 假如)) (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (VP (VV 愿意) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 拥抱) (NP-OBJ (NN 改变))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 而)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (VV 去) (VP (VV 抗拒) (NP-OBJ (NN 改变))))))))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (PN 他们)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 将)) (VP (VP (VE 有) (NP-OBJ (NN 机会))) (VP (VRD (VV 转进) (VV 到)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VA 新))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 技术) (NN 领域)))))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 而)) (ADVP (AD 不)) (VP (VC 是) (VP (ADVP (AD 眼睁睁)) (VP (VV 看) (AS 著) (NP-OBJ (DNP (NP (PN 自己)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 心血))) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (LB 被) (CP-OBJ (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (IP (NP-SBJ (NN 别人)) (VP (VV 取代) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)))))))))))))

假如 他们 愿意 *PRO* 拥抱 改变 ， 而 不 是 去 抗拒 改变
